title: Universal stalling — 30 auto-pass events across all players
description:
All players in the game triggered auto-pass stall detection at least once, totaling 30 auto-pass events. This suggests models frequently get stuck in states where they neither take actions nor properly pass priority, requiring the harness to force-pass for them.

Evidence from game_20260209_184021: 30 auto-pass stall events spread across all 4 players. This wastes game time and causes models to miss opportunities.

Possible fixes:
- Investigate what states cause stalling — is it waiting for actions that never come, or failing to process callbacks?
- Reduce the stall detection timeout to minimize wasted time
- Add logging to capture exactly what callback/state the model was stuck on when auto-pass fires
